Title: Patch Adams
Overview: The true story of Dr. Hunter "Patch" Adams, who in the 1970s found that humor is the best medicine, and was willing to do just anything to make his patients laugh—even if it meant risking his own career.
production_companies: Universal Pictures, Bungalow 78 Productions, Blue Wolf, Farrell/Minoff
Cast: Robin Williams, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Bob Gunton
